title: `push` does not reveal `annex copy` error
body:
The underlying error is #5110, but without checking a manual `git annex copy` call, this is not evident from datalad's reporting:

```
% datalad push --to lab
Push to 'lab':  25%|██████████▊                                | 1.00/4.00 [00:00<00:00, 7.01k Steps/sCommandError: 'git annex copy --batch -z --to lab-storage --json --json-error-messages --json-progress --fast' failed with exitcode 1 under /home/mih/psycho/talks/reveal                                      
git-annex: copy: 48 failed
```

```
[DEBUG  ] Launching process ['git', 'annex', 'copy', '--batch', '-z', '--to', 'lab-storage', '--json', '--json-error-messages', '--json-progress', '--fast'] 
[DEBUG  ] Process 705529 started

Total:   0%|                                                                                                                                                                       | 0.00/127M [00:00<?, ? Bytes/s[DEBUG  ] Process 705529 exited with return code 1 
Traceback (most recent call last):

    for r in _process_results(
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 549, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/core/distributed/push.py", line 261, in __call__
    yield from _push(
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/core/distributed/push.py", line 547, in _push
    yield from _push(
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/core/distributed/push.py", line 571, in _push
    yield from _push_data(
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/core/distributed/push.py", line 849, in _push_data
    res = ds_repo._git_runner.run(
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmd.py", line 514, in run
    raise CommandError(
datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: 'git annex copy --batch -z --to lab-storage --json --json-error-messages --json-progress --fast' failed with exitcode 1 under /home/mih/psycho/talks/reveal [err: 'git-annex: copy: 48 failed'] [info keys: stdout_json]
```
